Contact Us

In The Open

As an open source project, most communication about Buildbot is done in the open:

  • The buildbot mailing list
  • The #buildbot IRC channel on Freenode
  • The project organization on Github
  • The Buildbot issue tracker

For Security Issues

If you have a discovered a security-related issue in Buildbot, please see the ReportingVulnerabilities page for the project's disclosure process.

For Private Matters

For other matters which absolutely cannot be handled in the open, you may contact the maintainer, Dustin J. Mitchell, directly at dustin@v.igoro.us.
